column1: Funeral services will be held 11:00 a.m. Tuesday June 23
column3: Freeland. Rev. Fr. Robert Deland will officiate. Burial will follow in Pine Grove Cemetery
column4: Freeland. Friends may call at the Cunningham/Taylor Funeral Home
column6: Freeland on Monday from 2:00-8:00 p.m. and at church on Tuesday from 10:00 a.m. until time of service. A Wake service will be held on Monday at 7:00 p.m. at the funeral home.
